> How can u make some people sneeze others notDifferent people react to the irritant we are giving off differently. I think those with asthma react worse than others because they are more sensitive to irritants in the environment.

question: I wonder has anyone found a soulution. I have been diagnosed as having Gerd and also borderline diabetes. I changed my diet but still when Im around peopl they act like I launched off a army of bees.. Rubbing their eyes and noses. Im afraid to be around anyone.
title: How can u make some people sneeze others not
